mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT result1.*, ROWNUM as rnum FROM (SELECT num, price, writer, clothesize, caption, imagePath, regdate FROM board_image ORDER BY num DESC) result1) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startRowNum} AND #{endRowNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board_image (num, price, writer, clothesize, caption, imagePath, regdate) VALUES(board_image_seq.NEXTVAL, #{price}, #{writer}, #{clothesize}, #{caption}, #{imagePath}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT num, price, writer, clothesize, caption, imagePath, regdate, LAG(num, 1, 0) OVER (ORDER BY num DESC) AS prevNum, LEAD(num, 1, 0) OVER (ORDER BY num DESC) AS nextNum FROM board_image ORDER BY num DESC) WHERE num = #{num}
